content:
@BWPanda ++

Thanks again for this. I haven't been using it for a while, but just reconfigured my local lando template to incllude your snapshot and reset. I love it.

Do you still use this?
https://gist.github.com/BWPanda/0c0210191c399ae041b9da3eacdef8bc

Lando config: Backdrop sandbox
Lando config: Backdrop sandbox. GitHub Gist: instantly share code, notes, and snippets.

Do you still use this?

Yep! Pretty much exactly as it is there (only a few minor changes which I'm not sure others would benefit from). Glad you're finding it useful :smiling_face:
